Posts.Content: Frannie1972 wrote: So I will have my 6 month follow up this month after having an initial finding of microcalcs on annual mammo and a finding of benign microcalcs on mammo the following week. This month's mammo will look for "stability." If they were benign to begin with , could they become not benign? I understand microcalcs are not cancerous themselves can sometimes be indicative of cancer but if diagnosed as benign and nothing else showed up, how likely could something else appear at 6 month follow up? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Benign microcalcs 6 month follow up Frannie1972 MelissaDallas
